name: PowerCenter:Column Naming convention in transformation
description:
All input fields name must begin with the prefix value X (IN_).
All output fields name must begin with the prefix value Y (OUT_).
All variable fields name must begin with the prefix value Z (V_).
The prefix are parameters and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all Transformations containing naming conventions not respected. 
It provides the following information: Transformation full name, Column name
rationale: For understandability and maintainability, naming conventions must be respected.
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention
